solution_line_template: There are {top_layer_blocks} * {multiplier} = <<{top_layer_blocks}*{multiplier}={second_layer_blocks}>>{second_layer_blocks} blocks in the second layer.
There are {second_layer_blocks} * {multiplier} = <<{second_layer_blocks}*{multiplier}={third_layer_blocks}>>{third_layer_blocks} blocks in the third layer.
There are {third_layer_blocks} * {multiplier} = <<{third_layer_blocks}*{multiplier}={fourth_layer_blocks}>>{fourth_layer_blocks} blocks in the fourth layer.

Thus, there are {top_layer_blocks} + {second_layer_blocks} + {third_layer_blocks} + {fourth_layer_blocks} = <<{top_layer_blocks}+{second_layer_blocks}+{third_layer_blocks}+{fourth_layer_blocks}={total_blocks}>>{total_blocks} sandstone blocks in the pyramid.
